DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
This card's primary effects are active while in your hand. A Gift may also have an additional effects with triggers.
Blasted creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, the blast worsens, but the worse the blast is the more likely it is to wear off.
Detonates and damages all enemies within at most 3 turns.
This card resets its conditional effect when played.
Cards may have listed bonus effects at specific Norma levels.
This card's effect is unaffected by powers.
This card #yTransforms when drawn or retained.
This turn, the Wanted enemy becomes the target of all attacks and negative effects, with one exception; the Wanted enemy will not attack or debuff itself.
This card can not be obtained from normal card-drops.
Gain more block the next time a Block gaining card is played.
This card Retains while it has uses, and Exhausts when it is out. One use is consumed when this card is discarded, or retained.
If a target with a mark is hit for... NL 6 or less damage: Raise the damage to 7 and ignore block. NL 7 or more damage: Gain 3 temporary HP. NL One mark then consumed.
